description:
Yoshizuki Iori was born March 21, 1981 (she is 16 years old as the series begins). Iori is prim, proper, and friendly, not to mention gorgeous. She`s a young lady who`s easy to like and get along with. This generally positive outlook is put to the test from the beginning of the series, which opens on a magazine article featuring Iori in a swimsuit spread. Suddenly, Iori`s the center of attention, and she finds it difficult to differentiate whether people (particularly men) like her for herself or her beauty.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Yoshizuki Iori
